moduleDesc: A module for the Italian Manga.

mainPage.javaScript: function Header(key, value){ this.key = key; this.value = value; } function ExtraInfo(value){ this.value = value; } function Output(sectionName, mangasArray){ this.sectionName = sectionName; this.mangasArray = mangasArray; } function MangasArray(moduleID, image, link, title){ this.moduleID = moduleID; this.image = image; this.link = link; this.title = title; } function MainPageObject(request, headers, method, extraInfo, loadJavascript, javaScript, output){ this.request = request; this.headers = headers; this.method = method; this.extraInfo = extraInfo; this.loadJavascript = loadJavascript; this.javaScript = javaScript; this.output = output; } function shuffle(a) { var j, x, i; for (i = a.length - 1; i > 0; i--){ j = Math.floor(Math.random() * (i + 1)); x = a[i]; a[i] = a[j]; a[j] = x; } return a; } var savedData = document.getElementById('katsu-final-data'); var parsedJson = JSON.parse(savedData.innerHTML); var moduleID = '11305'; var headers = [new Header('', '')]; var extraInfo = []; var currentPos = parseInt(parsedJson.extraInfo[0].value); var mainPageObject; var output = []; var sectionName = ''; var nextRequest = ''; try { nextRequest = parsedJson.extraInfo[currentPos + 1].value; }catch (e) { console.log(e); } if (currentPos != 0) { output = parsedJson.output; } var mangasArray = []; data = document.querySelector('#news').querySelectorAll('li'); for (let x = 0; x < data.length - 1; x++) { let manga = data[x]; let image = 'https:'+manga.querySelector('div.hottestImage > img').getAttribute('data-src'); let link = 'https://www.mangaeden.com'+manga.querySelector('div.hottestInfo > a').href; let title = manga.querySelector('div.hottestInfo > a').innerText; mangasArray.push(new MangasArray(moduleID, image, link, title)); } output.push(new Output(sectionName, mangasArray)); for (var x = 0; x < parsedJson.extraInfo.length; x++) { var object = new ExtraInfo(parsedJson.extraInfo[x].value); extraInfo.push(object); } extraInfo[0].value = '' + (currentPos + 1); mainPageObject = new MainPageObject(nextRequest, headers, '', extraInfo, '', '', output); var finalJson = JSON.stringify(mainPageObject); savedData.innerHTML = finalJson;

search.javaScript: function Header(key,value) { this.key = key; this.value = value; } function ExtraInfo(value) { this.value = value; } function Output(moduleID,image,link,title,type,voice,stars) { this.moduleID = moduleID; this.image = image; this.link = link; this.title = title; this.type = type; this.voice = voice; this.stars = stars; } function SearchObject(request,method,headers,separator,extraInfo,loadJavascript,javaScript,output) { this.request = request; this.method = method; this.headers = headers; this.separator = separator; this.extraInfo = extraInfo; this.loadJavascript = loadJavascript; this.javaScript = javaScript; this.output = output; } var savedData = document.getElementById('katsu-final-data'); var parsedJson = JSON.parse(savedData.innerHTML); var moduleID = '11305'; var headers = [new Header('','')]; var extraInfo = [new ExtraInfo('')]; var searchPageObject; var output = []; data = document.querySelector('#mangaList > tbody').querySelectorAll('tr'); for (x=0; x<data.length; x++) { result = data[x]; main = result.querySelector('td > a'); image = 'https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/795348438501163018/817975937504116776/no_image.png'; link = 'https://www.mangaeden.com' + main.href; title = main.innerText; type = 'Manga'; voice = 'Italian'; stars = result.querySelector('td.chaptersLenList').innerText; output.push(new Output(moduleID, image, link, title, type, voice, stars)); } searchPageObject = new SearchObject('','',headers,'+',extraInfo,'','',output); var finalJson = JSON.stringify(searchPageObject); savedData.innerHTML = finalJson;

info.javaScript: function Header(key, value) { this.key = key; this.value = value; } function ExtraInfo(value) { this.value = value; } function Output(moduleID, image, link, title, description, genres, type, status, chapters) { this.moduleID = moduleID; this.image = image; this.link = link; this.title = title; this.description = description; this.genres = genres; this.type = type; this.status = status; this.chapters = chapters; } function Chapters(link, moduleID) { this.link = link; this.moduleID = moduleID; } function InfoObject(request, method, headers, extraInfo, loadJavascript, javaScript, output) { this.request = request; this.method = method; this.headers = headers; this.extraInfo = extraInfo; this.loadJavascript = loadJavascript; this.javaScript = javaScript; this.output = output; } var savedData = document.getElementById('katsu-final-data'); var parsedJson = JSON.parse(savedData.innerHTML); var moduleID = '11305'; var headers = [new Header('','')]; var extraInfo = [new ExtraInfo('')]; var infoObject; var output; var linkData = parsedJson.request; var chapters = []; var type = 'N/A'; var status = 'N/A'; var genres = ['N/A']; var desc = document.querySelector('#mangaDepion').innerText; var image = 'https:'+document.querySelector('#rightContent > div.info.rightBox > div > img').src; var title = document.querySelector('#leftContent > h1 > span').innerText; var chapterData = document.querySelector('#leftContent > table > tbody').querySelectorAll('tr > td > a.chapterLink'); for (let i = 0; i < chapterData.length; i++) { chapters.push(new Chapters('https://www.mangaeden.com'+chapterData[i].href,moduleID)); } chapters.reverse(); output = new Output(moduleID,image,linkData,title,desc,genres,type,status,chapters); infoObject = new InfoObject('','get',headers,extraInfo,'','',output); var finalJson = JSON.stringify(infoObject); savedData.innerHTML = finalJson;

chapters.javaScript: function Header(key, value) { this.key = key; this.value = value; } function ExtraInfo(value) { this.value = value; } function Output(link, moduleID, headers) { this.link = link; this.moduleID = moduleID; this.headers = headers; } function ChaptersObject(request, method, headers, extraInfo, loadJavascript, javaScript, output) { this.request = request; this.method = method; this.headers = headers; this.extraInfo = extraInfo; this.loadJavascript = loadJavascript; this.javaScript = javaScript; this.output = output; } var savedData = document.getElementById('katsu-final-data'); var parsedJson = JSON.parse(savedData.innerHTML); var moduleID = '11305'; var headers = [new Header('Referer',parsedJson.request)]; var extraInfo = [new ExtraInfo('')]; var chaptersObject; var output = []; var data = document.querySelector('#image > p').innerText; var amount = document.querySelector('#pageSelect').querySelectorAll('option').length; split1 = data.split('fs'); for (x = 0; x<amount; x++) { let split2 = split1[x+1].split(','); let split3 = split2[0].split(':'); let slice = split3[1].slice(2, split3[1].length-1); let link = 'https:'+slice; output.push(new Output(link, moduleID, headers)); } chaptersObject = new ChaptersObject('','',headers,extraInfo,'','',output); var finalJson = JSON.stringify(chaptersObject); savedData.innerHTML = finalJson;
